#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<long long >players;
int arr[200];
int check[200];
int main()
{
int test;cin>>test;int t;int temp;int i,j;
for(t=0;t<test;t++)
{
players.clear();
memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));
memset(check,0,sizeof(check));
for(i=0;i<11;i++)
{
cin>>temp;
players.push_back(temp);
arr[temp]++;
}
sort(players.begin(),players.end());
reverse(players.begin(),players.end());
int k;
cin>>k;int sum1=0;
for(i=0;i<k;i++)
{
	sum1+=players[i];
	check[players[i]]++;
}
int n,m,l;int result=1;
for(i=0;i<=100;i++)
{
	if (check[i]!=0)
	{
	n=1;
	m=1;
	l=1;
	for (j=1;j<=arr[i];j++)
	n*=j;
	for (j=1;j<=check[i];j++)
	m*=j;
	for (j=1;j<=(arr[i]-check[i]);j++)
	l*=j;
	result*=(n/(m*l));
	}
}
cout<<result<<"\n";
}//test
	return 0;
}//main
